headline.main: Convoys to Russia Running On Schedule, British Note; CONVOYS TO RUSSIA RUN ON SCHEDULE

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Friday, Jan. 1 -- Convoys to Russia are running on a "regular timetable" despite all German efforts, and Nazi capital ships have been contained harmlessly during the year, the Royal Navy Review for 1942 said today. The bitterest convoy fighting occurred on the North Russia and Malta runs, but the Navy proudly declared:
abstract: Brit Navy repts convoys to USSR run on schedule
